bib.title: Integration of remote sensing derived parameters in a crop model: Case of hay
bib.citation: 2016 IEEE International Geoscience and Remote Sensing Symposium (IGARSS …, 2016
bib.author: Mohammad El Hajj and Nicolas Baghdadi and Bruno Cheviron and Gilles Belaud and Mehrez Zribi
bib.conference: 2016 IEEE International Geoscience and Remote Sensing Symposium (IGARSS)
bib.abstract: The aim of this study is to assess the interests of integrating remote-sensing-derived parameters (LAI, harvest and irrigation dates) in a crop model (PILOTE) that simulates vegetation growth for hay crop.
